author: Douglas Gelevan
title: Victor Wanyama's search for happiness in Montreal postponed by the pandemic
description: Victor Wanyama says management at his former club Tottenham Hotspur F.C. frustrated him to the point he started to lose his passion for the game. He's hoping for a fresh start in Montreal.
content:
Running sprints alone up a stairwell in his condo building isn't exactly how Victor Wanyama pictured things would be a month into his time in Montreal.
But the Impact's newest designated player is trying to make the best out of an unprecedented situation.
"… [+5676 chars]
